website_summaries.verdict: This iron gets hotter than other options, and we love the included helping hands, but the lack of a power indicator light costs it a bit in terms of safety.
pros: Soldering iron is 30 to 50 watts and 110 volts, with an adjustable temperature of 200 to 500 degrees Celsius
Kit comes with 12 pieces in all, including helping hands with a magnifying glass and a stand with a brass tip cleaner
cons: No LED on the iron to tell you when it reaches soldering temperature or is even on
Takes a little while for this option to heat up
Reports of the tip threads stripping easily

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: I had no experience soldering before this so I find this kit to be perfect for beginners. Everything seems well built, the case is very useful (I needed to solder in the field), the helping hands are erm, helpful, and I was able to solder some fine pieces which surprised even me. Definitely recommend this to other beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Manero

customer_reviews.title: Complete set with good quality parts and adjustable iron.
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. Is comes with everything you need to get started soldering. The iron being adjustable has been a function that comes in handy more often than not. The case itself had enough room in it for me to store some tweezers and wire cutters as well to help complete the kit for what I needed it for. The soldier pen is reusable allowing you to drop new coils of solder directly into it and continue using it. Good package great price. I definitely recommend this to anyone who needs a complete set or newer to soldering and doesn’t have any of the items needed to begin.
customer_reviews.author: jAishO

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SOLDER KIT ON AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are just starting out soldering THIS IS THE KIT FOR YOU!! This kit has everything you need to get started and it all works great. The see through solder iron is pretty neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to be soldering a lot, the helping hand is a must. I wish the arms were a little more stable, but some tightening will get the job done. The rest of the kit is decent. The soldering iron itself feels a little cheap, but it heats quickly and works well. The case is a little confusing, and parts get loaded into both sides, but once you know where to put them, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Church Sound Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Went off the recommendation of many other buyers and I was not disappointed! Kit has everything to get started with small projects. To hold small circuit boards the helper works well but I am afraid anything with weight to it will make it unstable. I am still a novice but I think I made the right choice with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Deidraaa

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest but not a bad starter soldering kit
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest but not a bad starter soldering kit. I especially like the magnifying glass/ helping hands holder. I gave it a four because it has an adjustment dial on it that will allow you to turn it off but you won't know if it's off or not because it doesn't click into the off position so I'd be a little careful in handling it. but the rest of it is nice for a starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Cust. JLStemley

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit !!! Everything you need to start soldering.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package of soldering products for a beginner or an advance student or hobbyist in soldering. The kit comes with all necessary and quality equipment at a great price.. What really sold me on this product was the iron and brass clear stand. The extra hands and magnifying glass is a definately plus. The only thing you can do to improve your status after buying tha kit is to by a soldering station. I highly reccomend buying this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Value
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing amateur work on guitar and amp electronics for years, and I bought this because I could buy solder wick, helping hands, and a cleaning sponge for about the same amount of money. So I took a chance, totally worth it so far. I am very impressed. Everything looks cheap admittedly. But it does not feel cheap. Great for beginners and light hobbyists, and despite some other reviews I find plenty of room in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Cummings

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED !
customer_reviews.text: Just received today , I could not believe how nice the product was . Everything said quality .The soldering iron stand is well made , heavy , and not just stamped metal . Iron heats very quickly . I am totally satisfied . Would make a great gift for the holidays for the handy man or lady .
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent kit for the beginner. The iron works well, and I like that it comes with three different tips to choose from. I only wish the helping hands had a bit heavier/sturdier base. It tends to wobble or fall down if you don't brace it with something. But you really can't beat the price. I would recommend this kit to anyone who solders on an occasional basis.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect much for the price, but WOW! ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much for the price, but WOW! A quality soldering kit for a very cheap price, The soldering gun is not just 2 temperatures, it is adjustable between the two temperatures with a dial. The carry case is even decent, instead of a thin, one piece plastic hinge, the case is two pieces with a real hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for instructions...
customer_reviews.text: I have never soldered before, and all the reviews for this said it was perfect for beginners. I was a little disappointed by the lack of instructions and literature that came with this. I was not sure what each item in the set was or what they were supposed to do. After googling and watching videos online I got the basic notion of how to use the things. I was able to fix my ring enough to wear again. It's not perfect, but it was what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit for small project soldering!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new soldering kit, it had all the parts I will need for small projects and I like the temp control on the iron with LED to show that it's up to temperature. The only thing that would be nice to include in a future kit might be a workspace mat and maybe some LED lights around the magnifying glass so you can illuminate what you are working on. I would have paid more for those items to be included, but are not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soldering iron DOA - Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The soldering iron was dead on arrival. Can’t find a simple way to contact seller. Looks like I am returning this. I really love the rest of the kit, however some quality control in simply testing the unit before shipping it could do wonders!!
customer_reviews.author: ERock

customer_reviews.title: A great kit for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I used this to fix my model 1 Sega Genesis and it works fine now. Iit was my first soldering project and I had no problems. What a great piece of hardware. It's nice that it included alligator clips, a magnifying glass and even a case. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S-Willy05

customer_reviews.title: Great Soldering Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the price. It was great that it has a magnifying glass and stand. Helps with my old eyes. Soldering tool works amazingly The case is a plus. Wish it came with basic instructions on different types of soldering.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't often rate products as four stars (or higher) but I believe this kit is worthy of a high score. First, it is a very complete kit with all of the tools needed for basic soldering work and a durable case to safely haul them around. It's priced at a cost that I've paid for just one or two of the components and yet doesn't skimp on quality to justify the lower price. I've used the kit for a few different projects so far and all of the tools have performed as required (and maybe a bit better).
customer_reviews.author: Gary Y.

customer_reviews.title: Undecided at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: So it didn't work well with what I wanted to use it for. Apparently stainless steel is is extremely hard to work with. However I have no doubt that is soldering kit will go to waste. Will update review when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Careful when you open it
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice Be careful when you open it. I noticed someone complained they didn’t get the two extra tips. I thought the same thing and then i spotted them on the floor. All the pieces snap into the case. But they almost all came loose in shipping. The case is actually made well. Pieces snap in nicely. Couldn’t handle the shipping though. Haven’t used it yet but seems worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The entire kit is great, but I am very impressed on the longevity ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find affordable tips for my name brand soldering iron, so I ordered this and saved money. The entire kit is great, but I am very impressed on the longevity of the tips. I have a few thousand joints soldered on the pointy tip and there is still no sign of damage to it. The solder sucker has also survived about a thousand uses, and it still works great. I would definitely refer this kit to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Well-made soldering kit for hobby and enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: The hard case to hold everything is great, and the kit itself is very complete for my needs. I wasn't expecting the soldering iron itself to have an adjustable temperature dial, which felt like a little bonus. That being said the only pieces I felt detracted from the quality were the magnifying glass being difficult to tighten down so that it would actually stay still, and needing to adjust my grip on the iron so I wouldn't bump the temperature dial. I would definitely recommend this kit to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little kit that includes everything the average tinkerer or DIYer will need to get started with soldering. This is actually my third soldering iron, and it replaces two previous Radio Shack models I bought over the years. Compared to those, this is a huge improvement. For one, it actually has temperature control and an LED indication light, and seems to be able to get much hotter. It also comes with a proper stand, as opposed to a stamped piece of metal that doesn't work well as an actual stand. The magnifying glass tool is also a handy addition, as is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for the diy.
customer_reviews.text: Used it the same day it was delivered. The gun itself looks a little cheap but worked. It has a red led light that turns on when plugged in, but after a while it went off, so I adjusted the temp knob and it came back on. Not sure if that's how it's supposed to work but it heats up good and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great kit just needs some flux
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a bad xbox one joystick today and everything worked great except the DE-solder wire didn't seem to have enough flux in it so i had to go buy some. After getting more flux the wire was sucking up solder and i had it fixed in 15 min. If you want to save some money by fixing broken electronics this kit will definitely get you started.
customer_reviews.author: Doug T

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Inexpensive, Quality Soldering Kit
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to get started, and the better quality base and 'helping hands', along with a better case, make it worth not buying the cheapest available. Just what I needed, and a few hours after receiving it had repaired exactly what I needed to using a screwdriver and just the items in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: If you're debating what kit to get on a budget, definitely get this one.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with so many *useful* and *quality* accessories. My favorite is the stand. It comes with a fantastic cleaning wire. The suction (desolder) tool is also really strong and effective. The soldering iron, as expected from all the other reviews, heats up really fast and stays hot. The clamp is also great. Really, you can't beat this kit at this price. You can save $5-10 by choosing other kits but this one has much more value.
customer_reviews.author: Shivang Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Died after a 5 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last July and today it died. if I had been using this every day for 12 months, I would not be so upset but it has been used 5 times for a few minor projects (LED, resistors etc). This is not acceptable and i want a replacement iron.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Saylor

customer_reviews.title: The threads on the iron messed up all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The threads on the iron messed up all of the tips it came with and it doesnt hold the tips firmly they wobble around. It also shuts on and off unexpectedly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I had toyed with getting a soldering iron for a little while and finally picked up this Soldering Iron kit and can't be more impressed. It is nice because it has all the things I knew I was going to need to start working on projects and then I found several things in the kit that I wasn't sure about, but ended up using and really liking.
customer_reviews.author: rpr

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I didn't bother spending more. This little unit works great and does a fantastic job. I have used it about 30-40 times since I got it and well it is WAY worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because the one he had was old. The fine point and magnifying glass with the holders made it easier for him to use, a third hand and it wasn't mine! The only other thing that would have made it better would have been a built in light source. All in all a happy husband
customer_reviews.author: desertmaggie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, this is a great starter kit for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, this is a great starter kit for the novice solderer. I bought it specifically to repair a pair of turntables, and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jingle Dingles

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need at above entry level quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need, and then some! High quality, especially for the low price! This kit allowed me to get going with some projects I was having to delay for too long. Great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great set all around!
customer_reviews.text: Very good assortment of accessories, including a blow-molded case. The iron itself has so far been excellent. and the price was very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Noon

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price not for professional soldering guys, but for small to mid-sized projects, it comes with everything you need and works flawlessly ony thing i wish it came with some more rosin paste flux the solder has flux inside so its good solder but yeah little tub of paste with it would have made it epic .. thanks i will definitely purchase more stuff from whatnotwidgets.
customer_reviews.author: ModManMatt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Get's the job done. Works pretty good and FAST. Comes with everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for a complete soldering kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to remove and solder components onto a PC board quickly and easily. Just add a PC board holder and you are all set to go. The magnifying lens is a big help and the metal solder sucker is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Toews

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. The slots for some of the tools are a bit hard to snap into, but they definitely hold them in place well once they are in. I followed the recommendations of other buyers and covered the gator clips' teeth with some heat shrink tube, as they are pretty strong and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: I would recomend whatnot to any one my 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recomend whatnot to any one my 5 stars are without a doubth my real feelungs about whatnot the main thing is that when the sale is delivered and processed they are still worrued about their oroducts performance thank you whatnot, i wish i knew the oersin that contacted me to say thank you for your interest in my bussiness
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Bout what you'd expect for the value
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything they pictured, basically what i expected... the soldering gun is pretty good but i intend to get a better one soon. Literally everything else is pretty quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little kit. For the price, you CANNOT beat it. Works as it should and heats up as it should, great little iron for little tinker tasks.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the price. It is compact enough to store away easily, but has everything someone needs to solve any wire soldering needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Han

customer_reviews.title: thats not of best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Soldering iron's tip started bending first time onward. Tried to tight the screws still its bending. Soldering iron is the important piece in this set. But, thats not of best quality.
customer_reviews.author: subaprakash

customer_reviews.title: he is doing soldering kits like making a speaker
customer_reviews.text: This soldering kit has everything you need! My 15 year old son is loving it. he is doing soldering kits like making a speaker. i love that it is teaching him a marketable skill.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used all of the items yet but the iron, stand, and 3rd hand worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae M

customer_reviews.title: ... training class and for the price these kits are great!! Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a Hands Ons training class and for the price these kits are great!! Totally worth the money. Quick shipment. You get a lot for the price! The only thing you don’t get is tinning flux. Thank you for a great product. On my way to Nevada for another Hands On class
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: For a novice is good enough Good for ocasional use
customer_reviews.text: For a novice is good enough Good for ocasional use
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: It Has Everything
customer_reviews.text: What an impressive product. Everything you need to get right to it for electronic soldering. I love the spare hands and the solder iron stand. Great value. I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality and functionality than I expected. Brought this to work and showed my friends. They were so impressed they purchased one of their own.
customer_reviews.author: Mgaribay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great. Very useful! The case is poorly designed - everything doesn't fit back into place very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: All the parts you need to get started with some nice extras. Love the magnifying holder and the solder sucker!
customer_reviews.author: TomInIll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice set for the price.. I used it to connect some wires for qa carradio installtio, the "helpin hands" unit really mad it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this set for my shop. It’s working great!
customer_reviews.author: Vago&Cat

customer_reviews.title: WONDEFUL SOLDERING KIT
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my sister and she loves it. She fixes jewelry etc. She stated it's a beautiful kit and many additional items in the kit that are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Brant

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson is very handy and used this outfit immediately--and is thrilled. The kit seems quite complete! And reasonably good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great all-inclusive kit for a beginner at soldering. Saved me time and money in getting started; combine this with bigclivedotcom video and start making stuff.
customer_reviews.author: B4 Serrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. The pointed tip id excellent for soldering small radio control connectors.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Especially like the helping hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to solder wires for a car stereo install. Works great. I especially like the "helping hands." So much easier to hold the wires together with the helping hands, then use one hand to hold the soldering iron and the other to feed solder.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great little iron for the house!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this nice simple easy to use kit. It showed up on time and everything works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: great kit with everything I needed to get started
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for some minor electronics hobby work, great kit with everything I needed to get started, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: ... a few times and everything seems to be working fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and everything seems to be working fine so far. WIll update in the future if I can remember to.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Waite

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Not made to work for too long.
customer_reviews.text: I used this soldering iron for about a week and it burnt out. I returned it and received a new one. After about two weeks, the replacement one burnt out. I have been soldering for a long time and never had an iron burn out on me so quickly. Very cheaply made. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: hector

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price and as a starter unit. has everything I need to get started
customer_reviews.author: Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good kit, very useful plus it has a plastic case so it is very easy to keep everything together for when you need it the next time!

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work just fine. I would have preferred a tackle box style ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work just fine. I would have preferred a tackle box style rather than a case, but that's a minor complaint to be honest...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality too
customer_reviews.text: A lot for the money and quality too. I was looking a la carte for all of the items included in this kit. This is surprising just how good it is.

customer_reviews.title: Great Soldering Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Soldering Kit -- provides everything you need to start soldering (and desolder).

customer_reviews.title: This tool works great! I love the different shaped tips and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This tool works great! I love the different shaped tips and the adjustable temperature. It is so nice to have everything in one handy case. I have used it several times already.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit with a unique look. Perfect for teaching your kids to solder.

customer_reviews.text: I'm a soldering noob so to speak, but this seemed to have all the gear you'd expect and need in a nicely packaged case.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent soldering kit
customer_reviews.text: I wish the power cord was a bit longer. Everything works great.

customer_reviews.title: second tip worked great. But the threads are stripped inside where you ...
customer_reviews.text: So, I regret buying another cheap soldering iron. First tip wouldn't get hot enough to melt solder, second tip worked great. But the threads are stripped inside where you attach the tips. So now the tip wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Mychael Baca

customer_reviews.title: best all around solder kit
customer_reviews.text: best all around solder kit. All the tools to make a semi-professional job without paying up to 500 dollars for pro-tools. Also the helping hands is key to making your DIY experience easy and rewarding. Not to mention that they send good 60/40 rosin core solder with the kit.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.

customer_reviews.text: Very Nice kit! High quality merchandise. Would recommend to friends.

customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Pretty much all you need for your soldering projects around the house.

customer_reviews.text: Received product and for the price it is a very good project set. Only issue I have is while soldering iron is fully adjustable it's always on.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great very happy with the product my my soldering jobs lot easier.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to solder. This is a great kit for the price. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, really fast shipping. everything was just as they described. Very happy, Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Pooped out after 1 use!
customer_reviews.text: May update once it's replaced, but I used it once, next day came back to use it again and it won't power on. Lest ye think I don't know what I'm doing I own multiple (Still working) soldering irons which I use on a daily basis with no problem. I design and engineer multiple small electronics products on a daily basis and have never run into any issue with any other iron that remotely resembles this problem. Thought about taking it apart and fixing it myself which I am capable of doing with ease, but why should I when I can request a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Benison123

customer_reviews.title: Iron issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have helping hands and case and whatnot.. The stand is pretty solid my brass holder had a nice dented lip still worked tho not a big deal the real issue was I had white pieces coming out of iron.. I think the where prices of the heating element...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect fast heat up and the holder is great for cool down
customer_reviews.author: Funshoppingmomma

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like it should and the price was right. The carrying case and magnifying glass are definitely an added bonus. The solder and holder really completes this turnkey soldering setup. Thanks! Very happy with it. My kid's broken light up toys now work again......
customer_reviews.author: Richie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Happy Recipient!
customer_reviews.text: Happy recipient! This was a gift and the recipient was very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a STEAL! All the parts were good quality, the price was amazing, all the little extra parts and pieces were a great bonus and I've been checking their website for the things we want before looking anywhere else. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Having such a fine tip on the iron made the work much easier
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this to fix a pair of headphones. Having such a fine tip on the iron made the work much easier. And the alligator clip holder was essential to keeping everything where it needed to be. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set for any small soldering you need to do. Excellent service and quality!

customer_reviews.text: Nice starter kit for anyone looking to repair electronics or jewellery.

customer_reviews.text: Only worked the first time. Didn't work the second time. Item returned.

customer_reviews.title: No comlaints.
customer_reviews.text: Kit is as good as advertised. It's not fancy but goes a great job for a rookie like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money. The de-soldering pump works wonderfully. Now if there was some way to keep my wife from taking it and melting holes in plastic cups with it for her sparkle balls.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.

customer_reviews.title: My go to soldering kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to soldering kit. I bought it because it has everything you need for soldering. This doesn't have a temperature gauge on the solder. But it's okay for me. As I have something to let me know the temperature. Highly Recommended!!!

product_meta.title: Professional Wood Burning Tools Kit 128Pcs Pyrography Kit for Adults Wood Burner Temperature Adjustable Soldering Iron for Soldering/Wood Embossing/Carving
product_meta.description:
This 128pcs wood burning tool kit is the most complete set in the market. You can find all the tools needed for your wood burning/soldering project. 

Updated Version
❤Most Complete Wood Burning Kit 128pcs
❤From Beginners to Expert
❤For soldering and wood burning
❤Heat Up Quickly
❤Come with hear resistant gloves
❤Adjustable Temperature from 200-450℃

Note:
Please keep it away from children.
Please use a work glove to to avoid burns.
Please change tips after the temperature drops or use needle-nose pliers to change it.
After use, you'd better wipe with a towel to ensure that the tips are clean and tidy.

Package dimensions: 
3 X 9 X 11 inches 
Unit weight: 1.7 pounds

Package List
1 x Wood burning pen
59 x Wood burning and iron tip
25 x Wood pieces
2 x Gloves
1 x Tin wire
18 x Colored pencils
7 x Graphic stencils
1 x Sponge
10 x Carbon paper
1 x Soldering iron holder
1 x Storage box
1 x PU bag
1 x Instruction
feature_bullets: Most Complete Wood Burning Kit ❤ 128pcs wood burning tools kit comes with all basic essential tools for wood burning/soldering. Package Included: 1 x 60W temperature-adjustable soldering iron wood burning pen, 59 x wood burning and iron tip, 25 x wood pieces, 2x gloves, 1x tin wire, 18 x colored pencils, 7 x graphic stencils, 1 x sponge, 10 x carbon paper, 1 x soldering iron holder, 1 x storage box, 1 x PU bag.

From Beginners to Expert ❤ With 128pcs basic tools, you can easily create a variety of designs on wood burning. Either you are a wood burning beginners or experienced experts, you are able to make your fun project on wood burning, soldering, image transferring, leather cutting, paper crafting, hot stamping and fabric textile embossing.

Ergonomic Design ❤ This wood burning pen is lightweight, the ergonomic handle allows you to operate at different angles without fatigue. The high-temperature protective case and the gloves protects you from working on the pyrography project in a long time without sweating.

Adjustable Wood Burning Pen Heat Up Quickly ❤ High quality 60W wood burner with heated ceramic technology quickly heats in 15 seconds, saving energy and environmental protection. The adjustable Temperature from 200 450℃. Has high- temperature resistance.

Life-time Support ❤ 60-Days money back and life-time technical support provided. If you are not satisfied with the wood burning tool sets, please let us know and solve your problem firstly when you meet any issues.
